title: Creating a Color Demo Chart
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a color demo chart using Python's Matplotlib library. Matplotlib provides a variety of ways to specify colors, which can be used in charts, graphs, and other visualizations. We will explore these different ways of specifying colors and use them to create a chart showing voltage vs. time.
